explains: n. 政治家，国务活动家，治国之才

sentences.en: Hamilton is a great statesman and political thinker.
sentences.cn: 汉密尔顿是个伟大的政治家和政治思想家。

sentences.en: Success in the talks will reinforce his reputation as an international statesman.
sentences.cn: 谈判成功将会增强他作为国际政治家的声望。

sentences.en: There's Benjamin Franklin, the very model of the self-educated, self-made man, who rose from modest origins to become a well-known scientist, philosopher, and statesman.
sentences.cn: 本杰明·富兰克林是自学成才、自力更生的典范；他出身寒微，后来成为著名的科学家、哲学家和政治家。
